#  You're spending too much on customer support

Automate your customer support with AI. Create a custom trained GPT support
chatbot that can answer questions about your products and services in real-
time and reduce your support tickets.

Create Free Chatbot

loved by 150+ customers

##  Save time and money with a smart AI chatbot

##  You can save  $564 and 33 hours  
every month

Calculated based on the Startup plan ($30/monthly) and an average AI chatbot
resolution rate of 65%

Support Tickets

**300**  
per month

Time Per Ticket

**10**  
minutes

Hourly  
Rate

**$ 18**  
per hour

##  Trusted by companies serving millions to automate their customer support

##  Train AI on your content

A custom-trained smart AI chatbot that knows your business. Use your knowledge
base, support docs, PDFs, YouTube videos, Notion, API, or database to train
your chatbot.

##  Smart responses and live chat

Your AI chatbot will handle most of your customer's questions. When it can't,
it will escalate the chat to a human agent that can respond in real-time.

##  Match your brand's style

Your chatbot is fully customizable. Add your logo, set a theme and upload your
chatbot's avatar. You can even personalize your chatbots responses to use your
customer's name and other information.

##  Analytics and chatbot metrics

Detailed analytics about your visitors' interactions with your chatbot. Use
this data to find gaps in your knowledge base and improve your lead conversion
rate.

##  Works with all your favorite tools and platforms

##  Loved by our customers and their customers

lucky

Very intelligent and user-friendly

Nov 27, 2023

Jmer Manabat

Hello! Just wanted to say that I plan to use this for my thesis in my school.
And honestly, it saved me a lot of time. I liked how we can just train the AI
so that we get the responses we want. However, one thing I would recommend is
that in the positioning portion, it should be more flexible. Instead of the
bottom right corner and bottom left corner. It should have a center and top as
well. Maybe you could put a feature where users can position it anywhere on
their website page. That is all! Thank you!

Read more

Nov 1, 2023

Jason Chen

Founder

Created a crypto support bot with Sitespeak that's worked very well for me and
my customers. Will create more soon.

Oct 26, 2023

Ivan Anderson

Developer Support

Been using SiteSpeakAI for our internal docs for the past few months and it's
been great! With the Zapier integration it's been a life saver. Can easily
automate internal email queries. Support has also been outstanding!

Oct 26, 2023

Nick Crutzen

CEO

We love the ease of use in setting up the chatbots. Even if you aren't tech-
savvy you will be able to set up and train your on AI Chatbot. The Notion
integration is a real lifesaver as it makes sure we can use our common
knowledge base as a starting point for training the bot. www.curabhv.nl

Read more

Oct 26, 2023

Danny Vaessens

Kennisambassadeur

A real gamechanger. Since we started working with SiteSpeak, we've been able
to assist our clients and students more quickly. Our bot is trained using,
among other things, our Notion page where all the information for clients and
students is gathered in one place. If something is wrong with the bot, we
adjust the article and retrain our bot. Furthermore, the service from
SiteSpeak is excellent. If we have questions, they are answered immediately,
and if features are missing, they are implemented, provided they are
reasonable and within SiteSpeak's standards. We are truly enthusiastic about
the system and are convinced that this is the future.

Read more

Oct 25, 2023

Ludovic Isidore GNONWA

I find your site the best of its time. I created my ultra intelligent chatbot
in a few seconds.

Oct 24, 2023

Bhubai Mandal

CEO

As the Founder of WebTrackFlow, I understand the importance of harnessing
cutting-edge tools to optimize the online user experience. SiteSpeakAI has
quickly become a valuable addition to my toolkit. Its AI-powered features are
impressive, and the insights it provides are game-changers. It's user-friendly
and seamlessly integrated into our workflow. I wholeheartedly recommend
SiteSpeakAI to anyone looking to take their online presence to the next level.
Website:- WebTrackFlow.com

Read more

Oct 22, 2023

Tassos Manolis

VR Developer

Very good artificial intelligence services that will greatly help your sales
on your page for all needs easily without code. The support really very
friendly and prompt response to all my requests and suggestions! I recommend
it ! Tassos Manolis iribeyond.com

Read more

Oct 22, 2023

Herman Schutte

Founder

I might be biased, but I love that SiteSpeakAI allows me to put my customer
support on auto pilot for SnapWidget and Snapto (but still lets me live chat
to my customers when needed). 10/10 would recommend!

Oct 21, 2023
